thongtin: The husband had a heart attack when he learned that the children he raised were the products of his wife and brother.
At the age of 60, the husband wanted his old ugly wife to die first so that he could go one step further, not beyond the expected result that he was the first to die.
When he heard the news of his wife's death, he was overjoyed that he would be able to take another step forward with beautiful girls.
When she heard that her husband died of poisoning with her cooking, she tried the food she cooked but was still alive
Hearing the neighbor's news that her husband had died from stabbing a chicken, her sister-in-law quickly took her husband home to find out that the dead man was the neighbor's husband.
Seeing that his wife was beaten away by the waves, the husband immediately jumped to save his wife, but he could not swim and died, now his sister-in-law is happy with her new husband.
Her husband, suffering from cancer, passed away 3 weeks ago.
At the age of 70, the old woman passed away when she heard that her husband was still able to play with 3 mistresses outside.
The old man had a heart attack when he heard that his 60-year-old wife still asked to lift her breasts to swing with young men.
The boy owes too much money and commits suicide to not have to pay the debt, but every time he commits suicide, people save his life.
Waking up in the morning, the husband was kissed on the lips by his wife, he died on the spot because his wife's breath was too rotten.
The wife died on the spot when drinking too much alcohol, then the husband took the flight attendant as his wife.
The sister-in-law took her own life when she learned that her husband and sister were dating behind her back.
The husband committed suicide because his wife said his lower body was too small
The sister-in-law laughed at the company when she heard that her husband hit the butt of the pig, which suffocated and died.
Husband commits suicide because his wife forces him to submit papers every day
Her husband had just passed away, and the wife had gone back and forth with her husband's father.
His wife is likened to a lion. One day, when he heard a neighbor inform him that his wife had died because he was defeated by a raccoon, he hurriedly threw a party for 7 days and 7 nights.

Because the wife is too ugly, she wants to die first so that her husband can take another step with the beautiful girl, but every time she commits suicide, everyone helps her, causing the angry husband to have a stroke and die soon after.
The 60-year-old man, lying in bed for 2 days, made his wife wake up thinking he was dead, worried about the funeral, when he was placed in the coffin, he opened his eyes.
The wife died on the spot when she learned that her husband's mistress was the stepdaughter of her ex-husband.
After listening to the wife's gifted voice, the husband had a perforated eardrum and died on the spot
The husband has been dead for 3 years, and the wife has taken another step forward, however, the new husband died on the wedding night, because she had a husband's number.
When he learned that his wife had died from a nuclear bomb, the husband was so upset that he forgot to eat.
The husband died on the wedding night when his wife weighed 105kg on him.
